title: Blueair Blue Max 3250i Smart WiFi Air Purifier, HEPASilent Combination Filter Up To 48m² Rooms Removes 99.97% Pollen, Dust, Mould, Bacteria, Viruses | Activated Carbon Reduces VOCs, Odours
seller_info_text: Sold by Amazon Resale and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: MOST AWARDED AIR PURIFIER BRAND IN THE UK: Based on the awards received for performance between 2019-2023 (Conducted by 16 independent consumer associations, certifications, testing facilities and media houses)
UPGRADED BLUE RANGE: Meet the new Blue Max series with our unique HEPASilent performance, now even better; Up to 83% faster cleaning and 50% less noise than previous Blue models

FILTER 99.97% OF PARTICLES: Removes at least 99.97% of tiny airborne particles like viruses and smoke down to 0.1 microns, and captures pet dander, pollen, mould allergen and dust; carbon filter traps light household odours from smoking, pets and cooking
ULTRA QUIET: Quieter than a whisper at only 18 dB on low fan speed, Quiet Mark certified air purifier, perfect for use in your bedroom for a good night sleep

MORE CLEAN AIR, FASTER: Unique HEPASilent dual filtration technology delivers more clean air faster and uses less noise and energy than traditional HEPA filtration alone, Purifies up to 48m2 living space in 30 minutes or 20m2 in 12.5 minutes on high

SIMPLY SMART: Connect to the Blueair app to monitor your air quality, set schedules, use geofencing technology and more; RealTrack provides accurate filter tracking in the app; Control your air purifier with voice assistance
EASY TO USE: 5 colour indicator for air quality and simple two-button design make it easy to control. Fan speed 1 – 3, auto and night modes; Easy to use brightness control and child lock
ENERGY SAVING: Uses less energy than a lightbulb, as low as 2.5W – 20W depending on fan speed setting

SWEDISH DESIGN TO SUIT YOUR HOME: Scandinavian inspired pre-filter cover designed to blend into your home; Blue 3250i comes with a Stockholm Fog (Light Grey) cover; Other cover options available separately
